pages.text: It's generally hard to $(em)fully cook$() unprocessed ingredients as whole, so here comes "chopping board". Left-clicking and right-clicking the board with kitchen knife will cut ingredients into various forms. Note that some ingredients may not exist in a certain form.$(br2)To place an ingredient onto board, simply $(em)right click$() the board with the ingredient held in hand.

You can also use an axe to chop things on chopping board, for example chop down wood log to planks. $(br)Right click with items to put them onto chopping board. To chop things, left click chopping board with axe. There is a cool-down period after each item being chopped. $(em)The higher harvest level of axe will help you chopping faster!$() Tip: put inputs $(em)in off-hand$() helps re-supplying inputs to chopping board.
